list.description:
Эта катка набухнит от тестостероновой ядерки .
#mge

Utena Hiiragi and Minakami Sayo Smooch Prep. Warning this sight may obstruct your view. but who cares anyway, I for sure don't, I will hit my shots regardless.

This is my first sight and I used WTDraw to draw this and export it. I combined this with parts from another sight I don't remember the name anymore.

If anyone has any suggestions for sights for me to do or how to improve this one go ahead and comment.

Hope you enjoy not seeing the battlefield before you.

#wtdraw #hiiragi #hiiragi_utena #magia_baiser #magia #magia_azure #magiaazure #magiabaiser #utena_hiiragi #utena #minakam...

Yakuza 0 style Crosshair

Hey hey fellas!
My 10th usersight is now up and it is a Yakuza-themed crosshair that a good friend of mine requested to make.
https://images-live.warthunder.com/83e/9ee/33e5bbc64d7831a156b4b666c4ab872fac.png

It took a long while for me to post more usersights because of me being caught up in my final summer class project, but now, since I am finally finished with my 4-week summer class, I can get back to making more usersights now!

there are two versions of the usersight inside the zip file, with the difference...

Noelle_Kirara ver
